title: Otome Gēmu no Akuyaku Demonai Reijō wa Fianse o Hitasura Aisuru - Novel Updates
tags: Cute Story   Female Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Oneshot   Otome Game   Reincarnation
author: Mizuki Yukimi   水城雪見
description:
Arisa had unexpectedly remembered her previous life.

When she remembered that her fiancée was the capture target in that otome game, her fiancée finally met with the heroine. There are neither death flags nor ruins flag. This is just a cute story of the rival characters.>
